name: DOOM 2D (itch) (Nine lives)
description:
(Play in fullscreen if you are playing the HTML5 Version)

I Was Bored So I made DOOM 2D

It's my first game so the code is very messy and buggy

Right now the game is a High Score game but I will change that in the future

Zombie Sounds can be loud and annoying so if you want to disable them press F1 on the main menu
